analysis.description: NoNoCoin.isContract (/unique_chucks/44/0x871e740f9f3972ec1700fa9a3f5edfa09f73b202.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/44/0x871e740f9f3972ec1700fa9a3f5edfa09f73b202.sol:
	Contract NoNoCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x871e740f9f3972ec1700fa9a3f5edfa09f73b202.sol#133-136)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

NoNoCoin.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/44/0x871e740f9f3972ec1700fa9a3f5edfa09f73b202.sol)
